mission.description: Oerl Integrated is determined to recapture the AGI Researchers you have been hiding. This was expected, but the fact that Vorsiber is backing them and providing a security lockdown for the area is completely unexpected.
mission.strategy_tip: This kind of lockdown prevents your units from leaving the lockdown area, but allows free movement of anyone into the area. The typical logic is to prevent criminals from escaping, but not to block co-conspirators from revealing themselves.
